alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Clinton, northwestern Lamoille, southern Grand Isle, northwestern Chittenden and central Franklin Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grand Isle, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Enosburg Falls, Franklin, St. Albans City, Fairfax, Sheldon, Georgia, Enosburg, Grand Isle, St. Albans Town, Enosburg Falls Village, Milton, Bakersfield, Lake Carmi State Park, Georgia Center, Fletcher, Fairfield, South Hero, North Hero, Belvidere, and Berkshire. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 103 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
